title: Calgary Typos December meet-up
content:
We've got a special guest showing up at the December gathering -- and some interesting discussions I'm sure!

Wednesday, December 17  
1800 to ?  
Jupiter  
Upstairs, 124 Tenth Street NW  
Calgary, AB Canada

Yes, we have a reservation: we'll be in the back, to the left of the fireplace.
author: Linda Cunningham

comments.content:
(bump)

Clue about our special guest: coming up from the Bay Area, she's going to need all the wooly longjohns she can find. :-)
